subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is considered the father of Rajasthani literature?
question_hi: राजस्थानी साहित्य के पिता किसे माना जाता है?
explanation_en: Bhojakavi is considered the father of Rajasthani literature.
explanation_hi: भोजकवि को राजस्थानी साहित्य के पिता के रूप में माना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani poet wrote the famous epic 'Prithviraj Raso'?
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी कवि ने प्रसिद्ध महाकाव्य 'पृथ्वीराज रासो' लिखा?
explanation_en: Chand Bardai wrote the famous epic 'Prithviraj Raso'.
explanation_hi: चंद बरदाई ने प्रसिद्ध महाकाव्य 'पृथ्वीराज रासो' लिखा।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is the author of the famous Rajasthani novel 'Mool Chand'?
question_hi: प्रसिद्ध राजस्थानी उपन्यास 'मूल चंद' के लेखक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Bhikharidas Sthapit is the author of the famous Rajasthani novel 'Mool Chand'.
explanation_hi: भीखारidas स्थापित प्रसिद्ध राजस्थानी उपन्यास 'मूल चंद' के लेखक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani poet is known for his 'Vachan Sahita'?
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी कवि को उनके 'वचन साहिता' के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Mirabai is known for her 'Vachan Sahita'.
explanation_hi: मीराबाई को उनके 'वचन साहिता' के लिए जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is the author of the Rajasthani play 'Sangita Natak'?
question_hi: राजस्थानी नाटक 'संगीत नाटक' के लेखक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Lala Hanspat Rai is the author of the Rajasthani play 'Sangita Natak'.
explanation_hi: लाला हंसपत राय राजस्थानी नाटक 'संगीत नाटक' के लेखक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani writer is known for his short stories?
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी लेखक को उनकी कहानियों के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Haji Maloo is known for his short stories.
explanation_hi: हाजी मल्लू को उनकी कहानियों के लिए जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is the author of the Rajasthani epic 'Rasraj'?
question_hi: राजस्थानी महाकाव्य 'रसराज' के लेखक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Chand Bardai is the author of the Rajasthani epic 'Rasraj'.
explanation_hi: चंद बरदाई राजस्थानी महाकाव्य 'रसराज' के लेखक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani poetess is famous for her devotional poetry?
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी कवयित्री को उनकी भक्ति कविता के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Mirabai is famous for her devotional poetry.
explanation_hi: मीराबाई को उनकी भक्ति कविता के लिए जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is considered the greatest poet of Rajasthani literature?
question_hi: राजस्थानी साहित्य के महानतम कवि किसे माना जाता है?
explanation_en: Chand Bardai is considered the greatest poet of Rajasthani literature.
explanation_hi: चंद बरदाई को राजस्थानी साहित्य के महानतम कवि के रूप में माना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani writer wrote the famous book 'Rajasthan Ka Itihas'?
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी लेखक ने प्रसिद्ध पुस्तक 'राजस्थान का इतिहास' लिखा?
explanation_en: Dasharath Sharma wrote the famous book 'Rajasthan Ka Itihas'.
explanation_hi: दशरथ शर्मा ने प्रसिद्ध पुस्तक 'राजस्थान का इतिहास' लिखा।
